## RenderedConnection.distanceFrom() method

Returns the distance between this connection and another connection in workspace units.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
distanceFrom(otherConnection: Connection): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  otherConnection | [Connection](./blockly.connection.md) | The other connection to measure the distance to.  The distance between connections, in workspace units. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
